channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Login with Cognito
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Login with Cognito

item.title: CVE-2022-4200|2024-08-03T01:34:49.549Z -- unknown -- login%20with%20cognito
item.description: The Login with Cognito WordPress plugin through 1.4.8 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
